thread.section_title: London Marriott Hotel County Hall - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Winter Break
thread.title_full: Wonderful Winter Break - Review of London Marriott Hotel County Hall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kira S
title: Wonderful Winter Break
text: The London Marriott County Hall was the perfect hotel and the perfect location for our family vacation. Upon arriving our daughter was given a rose and she truly was treated like a princess our entire trip. The location was perfect for sightseeing by foot, by bus, car or boat. We loved the room, the pool and the staff. We hope to return very soon. Thank you Marriott for making our family feel so welcome.
